level.heading: Established.
level.text: There is established the Soil and Water Conservation District as a District of Columbia government agency.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-143, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 8-1701.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Section 15 of D.C. Law 4-143 provided that the Soil and Water Conservation District, established by § 8-1703, shall terminate on January 1, 1987, unless it is subsequently reestablished by an act of the Council of the District of Columbia. Section 8-1721, reestablishing the Soil and Water Conservation District, was enacted July 25, 1987.
